sub_title: Global-minded and culturally diverse legal expert in the Fortune 500 Oil and Gas industry, driving results & astute business and commercial solutions | Founder/CEO of Most Legal Counsel
summary:
A dedicated, results-driven, well-rounded in-house legal counsel in Fortune 500 international oil and gas, and energy trading companies, PETRONAS, Saudi Aramco, and Vitol Group, ranging from upstream (global exploration and production), midstream (natural gas liquefaction (LNG) plants) and downstream sectors (refineries, retail, and oil storage, and blending projects). 

A highly persuasive, commercially savvy, business-minded international contract law negotiator under different legal systems. Possess outstanding transferable skills and can demonstrate the highest levels of motivation and commitment required to achieve the organisation’s objectives. Proven problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail. Quick to grasp industry-wide developments and concepts and develop creative solutions to legal and commercial issues. 

Passionate about driving sustainable development in the renewable energy industry evident from recent key participation-related projects in CCS, Solar Power, Flare-out Gas, Biofuel Storage. Committed to leveraging my skills and expertise in the oil and gas, and renewable energy sector, and seeking opportunities to contribute to the advancement of sustainable solutions, drive the transition to a clean energy future, and reduce carbon footprint. 

Possess excellent interpersonal and collaboration skills with the ability to communicate at all levels, demonstrated through effective stakeholder engagement and multidisciplinary team coordination. 

Highly adaptable in a multi-cultural environment having studied, lived, and worked in the US, UK, Europe, and the Middle East for many years. A strong and dedicated team player.
